text: Nicolas Joseph Hanauer (born September 2, 1959) is an American business owner and investor in new businesses. == Selected publications == === Books === * The True Patriot (with Eric Liu), Sasquatch Books, 2007. * The Gardens of Democracy (with Eric Liu), Sasquatch Books, 2011. == References == == Other websites == * Category:American philanthropists Category:American chief executives Category:Living people Category:1959 births Category:Businesspeople from Seattle Category:Pages with unreviewed translations Category:Articles with hCards
title: Nick Hanauer
